name: Project R (BuizelKing)
description: Project R is a clean-cut and simple 2d roguelite, round-based rpg with a primary gameplay mechanic focused on rock-paper-scissors style combat. Players will move from battle to battle fighting various fantasy enemies using interchangeable equipment cards that take the form of either an Aggressive, Defensive, or Utility stance (Each fitting the position of Rock, Paper, or Scissors). As they beat enemies, they will be given the opportunity to swap out their equipment cards for other cards they loot from their enemies (or perhaps even trade from the environment or non-hostile npcs.
